title: Glucose Balance - 90 Veg Capsules
description: PureFormulas offers free standard shipping for Glucose Balance - 90 Capsules that may help you maintain a healthy glucose metabolism in the body.
cleaned_text: Description Experience healthy glucose balance with Glucose Balance! This powerful formula features natural ingredients like GlucoFit® extracted from Banaba herb known for supporting healthy glucose levels. Corosolic acid the active component in GlucoFit® has even been scientifically shown to promote balanced glucose levels. But that's not all - we've also included ChromeMate® a clinically validated ingredient that enhances chromium utilization and supports healthy glucose metabolism. Plus this formula is packed with essential nutrients like Magnesium Thiamin Pantothenic Acid and Biotin along with Gymnema sylvestre a renowned herb known for its role in glucose metabolism support. Take control of your glucose balance with Glucose Balance! These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). These products are not meant to diagnose treat or cure any disease or medical condition. Please consult your doctor before starting any exercise or nutritional supplement program or before using these or any product during pregnancy or if you have a serious medical condition. - MFG # P3318 - UPC # 707359133181 [https://www.protocolforlife.com](https://www.protocolforlife.com) Ingredients Serving Size: 1 Veg Capsule Per Serving / % DV Vanadium Amino Acid Chelate) 167mcg / Daily Value not established. Other Ingredients: Rice flour cellulose (capsule) and magnesium stearate (vegetable source). Not manufactured with wheat gluten soy milk egg fish shellfish or tree nut ingredients. Produced in a GMP facility that processes other ingredients containing these allergens. Vegan / Vegetarian / GMP. Dosage Take 1 capsule 3 times daily with food or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Precautions This bottle contains an Ageless® Oxygen Absorber to ensure freshness. Do not eat packet. If you are taking any diabetes medication consult your healthcare practitioner. Store in a cool dry place after opening. Notice: Natural color variation may occur in this product. Allergen Caution: Not manufactured with wheat gluten soy milk egg fish shellfish or tree nut ingredients. Produced in a GMP facility that processes other ingredients containing these allergens. Allergy / Dietary Needs - Dairy Free - Egg Free - Fish Free - Gluten Free - GMP - Nut Free - Soy Free - Vegan - Vegetarian - Wheat Free - Crustacean Shellfish Free
